Brian are you combat ready yet?
Opinion? anyone???

It looks like a Nosveratu with wings lol

Is it me or do the aviation fuel parts not actually snap together visually?

Brian are you combat ready yet?

Haven't had time to really do much

@camulus

IDK what those are so I cant say, really. It only has one fuel tank, though, for stability during fuel drain. That other section in front is a structural fuselage.

The Nosferatu is one of my VTOL craft from KSP Naval Academy.

Its just a basic design but rather efficient. I would also swap out the jet engine for the basic one. It's far more efficient and you will have a longer range.

Just checked your vid.

Nice, that Nosferatu is pretty similar to my Gekka, but the important question is this: Does yours have 6 missiles? Or even a place for them??

Still though, that was an epic design. Funnily enough, they handle pretty much the same, despite the lower mass of the Gekka, though I am using WASD, not a joystick.

I took my main inspiration from the Harrier Jump Jet, and it uses the TurboJet because it is more powerful. (Not to mention more efficient at altitude.)

Ya I don't have a joystick either, wish I did but I cant find one worth its price. I see why you used it, its a strike craft. I can put 4 of my missiles on the bottom of it But i designed it as a Laythe explorer. It had to be light enough to get 3 of them there in one launch. The Ulfberht is a heavier attacker that holds up to 8 missiles or bombs depending on the mission, but Its original function was as a rescue craft for stranded Kebals. Their inspiration comes from this.

Landing take 2.

Attention

Mods which affect persistence or craft files are not allowed...with one exception,TehGimp666 creator of build,fly,dream has recently released a multiplayer mod known as KMP .If both parties have this mod and agree to use it that is allowed.This will allow for air to air,surface to air,anything else to air combat and use for high TWR and generally being faster(Zekes).This allowance will greatly change the outcome of most battles tipping the scale away from slow hard hitters and toward lighter craft,So get building:)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55835-Kmp-0-22-wip-alpha
